My Work

And here is my project...

Student Register Git

Welcome to my Student Register Project

Ansi C

Student Register uses pointers, multi-dimensional array with header and source code to build and run the product! This project is able to register student to course as well drop the student from course with a small menu.

Managing how many students and how many courses they registering for are tired. This project is still developing along the side I have been developing my C skills also! ^^
